website_summaries.verdict: Vegan protein powder that has a lot of protein per serving and includes amino acids.
pros: 5 grams BCAA, and 160 calories per serving
Blends easily and has decent flavor
Protein comes from pea protein, sprouted navy beans, sprouted garbanzo beans, sprouted lentil beans, and cranberry seeds
cons: The amount of fiber caused stomach upset for some

website_summaries.verdict: Designed for optimal muscle recovery, this plant-based protein powder has several fruit extracts to boost the immune system and provide antioxidants.
pros: Probiotic powder with 2 billion CFUs per serving
Higher protein-to-carbs ratio than some other powders

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein powder! I've had many natural protein powders that taste like grass - this one tastes delicious considering it's made with peas! It tastes great with rice milk and even with water. Easily mixes together with just a spoon. I've added it to my berry smoothies and it flavours them nicely. Not thick or clumpy! I notice a difference in my stamina on days that I drink this. If you found my review helpful, please click Yes below! :)
customer_reviews.author: madeline audreyTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: The best I've had in terms of nutrition, taste is very good
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best protein I have found, especially in terms of nutrients. The amount of protein, the percentage of essential amino acids, plus the other nutrients is amazing. The taste - I have only tried the vanilla - is almost perfect, except for that odd Stevia aftertaste which I personally hate, but I know others don't mind. Besides that, it's really pretty good. A lot of reviews said it was frothy. I have found it to be smooth and creamy. Please see my video below. I used Califia Almond Milk and a banana. Nothing else. (please ignore dead parsley in background ;) )
customer_reviews.author: Dilara

customer_reviews.title: There aren't many protein powders that have top quality ingredients and taste great. This does both
customer_reviews.text: As a vegan athlete, I need to ensure I take in adequate protein. There aren't many protein powders that have top quality ingredients and taste great. This does both. I don't have to mask the taste, I can drink it as is. It is so nice to be able to finally find a plant-based protein drink that I can bring with me to the gym and not have to choke down after my workout.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not buying again after reading research done showing toxins in product.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to add protein from a non dairy source. I was happy to find the plant protein products but after reading information provided by the Clean Label Project; I'm looking into other options. Apparently, plant based protein products have some of the highest levels of contaminants including heavy metals, pesticides, arsenic, etc.
customer_reviews.author: jpmm

customer_reviews.title: Stick with the original Garden of Life protein powder. Tastes way better and has more protein.
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't like the taste and texture of this. It was ultra sweet. At first I thought it was good but I couldn't finish my shake. Maybe if you only use one scoop it's better but I bought the sport version thinking it would have more protein per scoop and it didn't, which is disappointing. I don't get the point of using this instead of the regular protein powder when it has LESS protein than the regular powder. My advice is stick to their original protein powder in chocolate. It's good.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: It has more fiber than stated
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for a relative that needs a special diet. I decided to gift this product with good intentions, I liked it because it's organic, vegan and low fiber according to the nutrition facts. However, this product is full of fiber! For people with IBS: run away from this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The taste is atrocious
customer_reviews.text: I was quite surprised to see all those positive reviews on it's taste. The powder tastes grainy, thick and not sweet at all. It feels like I'm drinking flour. The nutritional profile is pretty good but that taste... yuck! I'm going to have to force it down my throat cause I'm not into throwing money out the window but I will not buy this again!!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Langton

customer_reviews.title: ONLY 15 Grams of Protein Per scoop, not 30!
customer_reviews.text: Such a scam, I normally buy the Garden of Life protein that has 22g per scoop, then I saw this which states 30 grams. It is30 for two scoops, not one! It's more than 25% less protein content than the one I have been buying. This seems like totally false advertising, strange from this company... Also too sweet for my taste even though no added sugars...
customer_reviews.author: Joseph T. Lopiccolo

customer_reviews.title: Tore my stomach up
customer_reviews.text: It tastes terrible! Incredibly fake sweet! It tore my stomach up, giving me diarrhea!
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING Performance, Ingredients, & Decent Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Not joking when I say this has changed my life! I'm no gym rat, but I do my best to get the most out of my 3-4 workouts a week. From lifting to cardio, my recovery time has dropped through the floor, and my arms & quads have developed in the last 4 months more than in the preceding year! If you're hard-core vegan or just want to cut your dairy intake, this is excellent! I use 1 scoop for a cardio workout or a lighter weights day; 2 scoops for a heavy weights day. The MINOR downside is this isn't a vanilla milkshake; it tastes pleasant though. Add a little stevia if you need.
customer_reviews.author: C. Domrzalski

customer_reviews.title: Awful consistency and awful taste
customer_reviews.text: After trying it once, I will be throwing it away. First, it clogged my blender and made a mess. Second, once I got it blenderized and actually tried it, YUCK. It tasted like what I would imagine a Playdoh smoothie would taste like.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Swan

customer_reviews.title: Too thin.. you can make a mess and waste product.
customer_reviews.text: When I mix to water, it was slightly thicker than other protein powder that I tried before. My body didn't get bloated and the taste isn’t that bad, it didn't bother me. What bothered me the most is the fact that this powder is sooo thin and if you are not careful you make a mess. Let's see how long is gonna last the bottle and how is going to be the following weeks so I can decide if I will buy it again or not.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Clean Plant Based, Creamy Protein Shake!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a clean plant based protein that's vegan, gf, and low sodium for post workouts. After doing alot of research, it lead me too the Garden of Life Sport! It's kind of pricey, which I expected. I ordered the chocolate flavor and to my surprise it wasn't chalky or gritty. Instead it was smooth and creamy. I'm very pleased with the taste and how it aided in my post workout. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Evalani

customer_reviews.title: Dont get it!! Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The taste is terrible!! Im not a picky eater but this is tastes so processed/grainy/not like vanilla at alll! I've tried blending it with fruit to change the flavor but its impossible. Very powdery, even when I blend it doesn't end up with the creamy shake consistency other vegan protein powders do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla tastes horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible tasting (vanilla flavored). My husband is not picky about anything I cook or make for him. He asked me not to use this product in his shakes again. I tried it myself and it reminded me of trying to sneak grass into a shake. I tried different ways to hide the awful flavor but nothing worked. This is going into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: It's just alright
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty average stuff for plant based protein, I can honestly say I only bought it because it was on sale. I usually buy plant based protein and have tried a wide range, and this is pretty right there in the middle. Tastes good with nut butters and fruit (esp banana) but it still prefer other brands that are often cheaper. Get it on a Lightning Deal or something or with a coupon, but it's not exactly a steal at normal pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Ramiro Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Half empty plastic container, bad quality powder. 0 stars
customer_reviews.text: Not even 1 star worthy. 1. You get a HIGE plastic jar, that’s filled maybe 1/3 with a dusty , unpleasant looking substance. 2. This might have been acceptable, if 1/3 of the product was good. It tastes like very old chocolate mixed with moldy flower. 3. It does not mix well with anything . Not water , not milk , not nut milk , not soy milk , not juice . 4. You end up with a layer of chalk on your teeth and gums . So you get scammed into purchasing an expensive half empty plastic jar with a bad protein powder. That’s a NO for me !
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Everything I Need
customer_reviews.text: This is currently my favorite plant based protein powder! I prefer the vanilla flavor but I go through different containers fairly quickly. I love the taste of this one mixed with my coconut milk and cinnamon. I’ve tried quite a few plant based protein powders and this one is one of the best. Ordering another container as soon as I post this! (:
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Good protein but servings per container is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a protein powder that didn't have artificial ingredients, especially artificial sugars since my stomach can't tolerate them. This powder tastes great and doesn't have any artificial aftertaste. Best of all, I don't have any trouble digesting it. The container says there are 19 servings (2 level scoops) per container but that isn't accurate. I use one level scoop per day and get 28 days out of one container, not even close to 38 as I'd expected. Even so, this is the best protein powder I've found so far, so I'm sticking with it for now.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Nomer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like a sewer
customer_reviews.text: Holy FRICK I’ve had garden of life vanilla protein in the past and I remember it being tasty. I just got this and it literally smells like fart I blamed my boyfriend when i opened it and then once I put it close to my face I realized it was the protein. I tried chugging and the aftertaste was HORRIFIC. I gagged and I don’t even have a gag reflex. I can’t believe this tastes so horribly when other types of GOL protein are amazing. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: yg

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten this before and I loved the flavor of it. The two big tubs I got had a horrible taste to it, off on the color and texture. I didn't trust it so I stopped using it, contacted company with info and pictures. They said there was nothing wrong with the batch, it met their standards. So I tossed it. A few days later they sent me another email to return it to Amazon. Well I tossed it already. I'm very hesitant to purchase this again. I'm not sure if they changed anything but I was extremely disappointed in this purchase of it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. KavorkianTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Need to take a financial break from the $100 protein powders?
customer_reviews.text: I am a BeachBody protein shake girl and looked for something similar. I’ll be the first to tell you...it’s not out there. This product is not as nutritional as BB. BUT...it’s a great replacement when you need to take a financial break from the $100 powders. Tastes fantastic too! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: CAgirl1069

customer_reviews.title: An honest review
customer_reviews.text: I bought this powder after using Vega protein powder for over a year. This powder has a lot of great ingredients and I mainly bought it for that reason. I use it with almond milk in a shaker bottle, it never fully dissolves. I would give the consistency a 4/10, it is rough to get down and lives a thick sludge in your throat. The taste is a 5/10, not the worst thing I’ve tasted but you have to chug it quick or you won’t get it down. Ive been using it for about a week now and I’m fine with it despite my complaints. Probably won’t order again though.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this organic plant-based protein. It has 30g of protein, 5.5g BCAA’s, 5 g glutamine & glutamic acid. I did a lot of research and try other products that they claim it was vegan, gluten free, soy free, dairy free, but it was actually produced in the same place they do other products that do contain soy or dairy. I am extremely allergic to lactose products therefore, I am so happy I found this protein it is so easily digested and I haven’t had any issues or reaction like I had experiences with other brands. I really love this brand garden of life.
customer_reviews.author: liza vazquez

customer_reviews.title: ITCHY THROAT, ALLERGY
customer_reviews.text: ITCHY THROAT!!! I take a lot of different supplements so it took me a few weeks before I could pinpoint that this was what was causing my throat to itch and feel like I swallowed an apple. I’m writing this review to make people aware of the potential symptoms for pea protein allergy, which is what I believe caused my symptoms. I had the symptoms for over 2 weeks but once I cut this product out of my diet, my symptoms almost immediately dissipated.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Frontera

customer_reviews.title: Ok I guess
customer_reviews.text: Do you like farting? Then this is the product for you. However it definitely seemed to boost my workouts and energy levels for sure. I’d recommend this bc of the organic ingredients. Not really worth the price but hey, eating healthy costs a ton of money.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: does not mix well, but the most authentic I have found
customer_reviews.text: Pros - very authentic, the best protein powder out there for serious natural ingrediants - a lot of protien cons - does not mix well in a blender, you have to use a spoon - it does not taste the best, when i bought the lifetime protein shake, i could not go back to this one - just does not feel well with my stomach as well
customer_reviews.author: TheBSDKing

customer_reviews.title: hard to drink
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients are good but it's super hard to drink. Pretty grainy and thick. But, because it's plant based, it works super well for making protein pancakes. Not suuuper crazy about the taste of this blend but oh well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another product ruined by Nestle Co.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this powder for a few years and the quality has definitely fallen off. Nestle Co. Recently purchased this company and it really shows. I'll have to use some other protein powder. Lets not support a company who thinks that water is not a human right and should be privatized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome,  but....
customer_reviews.text: By far the best vegan protein powder! The only reason I am giving it a four star review is because you will be incredibly gassy! Other than that, it is my all time favorite protein powder!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nothing exceptional; Makes me sleepy
customer_reviews.text: The product makes me sleepy. I'm going to start taking it in the evening when I'm winding down for bed. The flavor is a bit like playdough but not bad. I got it to replace meat (protein & iron but no B-vitamins). I'm trying to get B-vitamins from produce, which I like much more than carcass. I liked that the ingredients were NSF certified, but I won't be buying it again. SunWarrior used to have a good unsweetened powder supplement, but they added the gums to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS MY FAVORITE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I know you all thought the vanilla flavor was great but NAHHHHHHHH MANNNNNN!!!!! This one is so much better than the vanilla!!!! Also I don't know if I'm disappointed by the lack of soreness I feel after a heavy duty strenuous workout the night before. However, I know it's the BCAA's doing their job and I know I'm in good hands!!! Trust me!! This is a great buy and you'll know what I'm saying as soon as you try this post-workout.
customer_reviews.author: Reliable

customer_reviews.title: One of the best tasting Vegan Protein out there.
customer_reviews.text: The is my second order, I tried it 2 months ago and got hooked. Best thing about it besides the amount of protein it provides, is the taste. Unlike other ones I tried no after taste and easy to mix and dissolve. I mix it with Almond milk one Banana, some blue berries, and ginger. I use it before and after a workout. I lost 8 pounds in 8 weeks from 172 to 164.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: My go to, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Organic without any weird additives. Mixes with water or any kind of milk very well. My go-to is one scoop with one tablespoon of PB2Fit and 8 oz of milk, usually almond or just regular 2%. I feel like it really helps my sore muscles recover quickly from a hard workout. I do the shake after a workout then I'm not as hungry at dinner time so I eat less and it keeps me from couch/Netflix snacking.
customer_reviews.author: Erin - TN

customer_reviews.title: Low Sodium! No dairy. Great Taste :)
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a pro but I was looking for a protein powder that had no dairy, low sodium/salt (below or close to 60mg), flavor, $35 or less (because this will be a REGULAR and committed purchase). If the price goes any higher into the $40s, I'm tapping out. Paying bills is unfortunately more important, protein powder is a luxury on top of my current healthy diet. Also, I hope they grow in creating more flavors, I eat the same flavor forever.
customer_reviews.author: NessaRose

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients and very good with almond milk!
customer_reviews.text: I usually drink Herbalife shakes but decided to try and cut out sugar all together- and those Herbalife shakes were the only sugar I was having all day- a lot! So this looked like a really good replacement, very healthy, also no soy, bonus! Considering the great ingredients and how healthy it is the taste is decent, Herbalife is better, but that’s where the sugar comes in! I tried it by itself and with almond milk, and it is really great with unsweetened almond milk!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Lyles

customer_reviews.title: It's all a matter of perspective
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I don't care for the taste of this product. I'm a fan of a popular brand of protein powder that blends whey, dairy, egg, and wheat proteins and has many flavors. On the other hand, my daughter, who is severely allergic to soy, sensitive to eggs, and told to eliminate wheat and dairy by her allergist, reports that this product is great compared to the alternatives available to her. I will definitely rebuy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Modern consumer report
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!! I'm a typical consumer and probably like most of you who are reading this. If you want a good protien powder this is not one of them. Everytime I use this i about throw up of smell to taste. The taste is chalked up. Not even close to being actually good. Horrendous if you will. This is the worst I've had and I've had i admit not alot but dont buy this. For the sake of your taste and nostrils.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Epstien

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good but leaves a film-like residue in my mouth
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this product after reading good reviews about its ingredient quality and purity. Like: The taste is very good, it definitely tastes like chocolate fudge. Dislike: It leaves a film in my mouth. No matter how well I blend it or with how much water. After drinking it, I feel gooey residues en between my cheeks and gum. I see the same effect on the cup I use to drink it. The residue is like a plastic thin layer that makes me want to brush my teeth immediately because of the disgusting sensation.
customer_reviews.author: Okr

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't taste great, but it will make you a ton of energy
customer_reviews.text: Eventually you get used to the consistency and flavor (its like swallowing sand). But I would definitely purchase again because there aren't many great vegan options out there, and this one gives an incredible amount of energy when training.
customer_reviews.author: NiaNia

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not enough of it in the container
customer_reviews.text: Great blend of clean ingredients and good amount of protein per serving. Good taste as well. Only reason I took off a star is not bevmcause if the rather pricier cost. It's because the container comes 70 % filled which is really surprising. It's barely over the halfway mark which is totally unacceptable. Otherwise a great product
customer_reviews.author: Spike Spiegel

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST PROTEIN POWDER HANDS DOWN, WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR? ORDER IT ALREADY!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious, easily blends, filling, and has clean ingredients. Has everything I look for in a protein powder. This is my first time trying and I will be purchasing it again and again. I absolutely love Garden of Life products and this one is a winner for sure. I notice I’m not sore as long after working out compared to other supplements I’ve tried. I also like it has 7grams of caffeine for the after workout so I can have a boost again after a grueling workout. I highly recommend. This is the first time I’ve ever written a review on protein powder, that’s how much I love this product! Thank you Garden of Life!!!
customer_reviews.author: VusViews

customer_reviews.title: Grainy texture
customer_reviews.text: No matter how long I blend the mix or let it sit, the texture is grainy. I blend the mix with fruits and veggies along with mixing it with another brand of protein powder and still it is grainy.
customer_reviews.author: ash

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and verified cleanly-sourced. It's good alone or mixed with other blended proteins. Garden of Life is hands down the best protein I've found. I wish Amazon/Whole Foods would fix the pricing issues. At times, it has gone down in price about 10 dollars (extremely significant) only to go back up a day later. Now, Whole Foods is not carrying it at all. If the discount is possible, why not build that in to a static lower price point? Not sure what the margin is, but even part of that 10 dollars would drive up consumption.
customer_reviews.author: Channels

customer_reviews.title: Blends great
customer_reviews.text: Nice taste, and blends very well. I never do smoothies, I only mixed with almond milk, and I find the texture to be far less gritty than the other protein powders I've tried. I also really love that they don't put a bunch of fake sugars in. There is a little Stevia, but it's fairly far down the list, and I can barely taste it! I will definitely be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Plant Based Powder Protein!!
customer_reviews.text: Use Garden of Life Plant Based Protein every day for our smoothies. Great product. Highly recommend for anyone interested in reducing the meat intake but still want quality protein and good taste. It is a pricey product and settles in the container because it is so dense. Especially like it because it has NO SOY & NO SUGAR in it.
customer_reviews.author: marce

customer_reviews.title: Horrible taste
customer_reviews.text: Purchased vanilla flavor. I mixed it with frozen fruits to help mask the flavor but still tastes horrible and doesn't blend very well like other protein powders. Still not able to find a plant based protein that tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: giSSI

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this product. Bought the vanilla. The taste is not great. I mix it with unsweetened almond/coconut milk and had a hard time gulping it down. I had to add in some fruit to the blender in order to have it be bearable. I love the amount of protein it offers, but will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Lyss

customer_reviews.title: Taste is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Super excited when I found out there was a vegan protein powder with so much protein however the taste is horrible. Taste like typical protein powder smells like clay. Doesn’t mix well. Not happy at all. Going back to orgain Organic protein.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients, BAD taste
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients were what was most important to me, so of course it gets a few stars for being very healthy compared to many protein powders. But the taste is awful. I mixed it with water and tried to drink it straight and literally gagged. I'll have to use it exclusively for shakes with lots of other ingredients mixed in. Maybe peanut butter and bananas.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Hinkey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I love the organic, plant based ingredients. This powder also contains probiotics. It mixes perfectly in my morning smoothies, which generally contain a variety of different fruit. The vanilla flavor compliments the fruit nicely. Peaches, strawberries, blueberries, raspberries, apples and bananas all go well with it. Ditto kiwi, soursop, really anything. One caveat is I do NOT like the flavor of the powder on its own - fruit and almond milk, however takes care of that easily. I'm on my second purchase of this brand. It's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Drysdale

customer_reviews.title: A Little Pricey, but Worth It
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is made by a homegrown company company that puts out a consistent and quality jug of fuel. I switched over to the Garden of Life products due to the decent results and breakdowns of their powders. Their supply chain seems way more legit than the major producers and it mixes and tastes decent.
customer_reviews.author: SuperTurboExtraGnarly

customer_reviews.title: A go-to plant based protein powder
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to plant based protein powder! No weird artificial sweetener flavor. No weird natural sweetener flavor. Great ingredients, great flavor and great mixability with water. I’ve tried many other products and I keep coming back to Garden of Life Sport protein powder (chocolate is my favorite). The only thing I wish is that they would bring back the strawberry flavor which was sold by sprouts Or Whole Foods (?) for a short period of time and was a great flavor!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Great for keto!
customer_reviews.text: I get tired easily of chalky tasting protein powders. Whey protein tends to upset my tummy and chocolate flavors hardly taste like.... Well chocolate. Got a sample of this from a friend and immediately fell in love!! Great taste with either milk or water (I prefer it with almond milk) and drink it within 30 mins post workout.
customer_reviews.author: CRM

customer_reviews.title: Hands down my favorite vegan protein
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several vegan protein brands, and stevia crashes the party every time. Most vegan protein powders are overly sweet and there's nothing you can do to mask that flavor. This one has a very subtle flavor, which I actually prefer because I usually add this to smoothies, so it's nice that the flavor doesn't completely overwhelm whatever I'm adding it to. That being said, it still does taste great and is a nice addition to smoothies, pancakes, etc! It isn't chalky and blends really nicely. I also usually bloat with other protein powders, but my body is responding really well to this one. I will be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: SamuelAnderson

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Blends smoothly so you don't get that powdery taste. I get the vanilla so I can add other fruits or yogurts with it. Love the amount of protein in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Eve S

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was in need of some kind of replenshing plant-based shake to aid after he finished running. he found that this was an amazing tool. He loves the flavor and while he may feel tired after his runs he doesn't feel exhausted as he did before with this product. Highly recommend it if you are in search of a plant based shake.
customer_reviews.author: D & D Parks

customer_reviews.title: Keep coming back to this protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I have tried quite a few equivalent protein powders but I keep coming back to this one. Would be great if it could come in a larger container to reduce waste to landfill as I now order this monthly. The flavor is not horribly sweet like others.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Great protein alternative
customer_reviews.text: First time trying plant based protein and I surprisingly love it. Definitely thicker than whey protein but much better flavor, less artificial tasting. Don’t have to chug it down post work out like non-plant protein competitors. The consistency is very thick and creamy, not too sweet. I’d note that it requires more water/milk than whey protein power. I bought the vanilla and mix it with blueberries, spinach, oat milk and a splash of water.
customer_reviews.author: Koko Pops

customer_reviews.title: This is the best protein out there
customer_reviews.text: This is the best protein out there. I have tried other whey and vegan proteins. This one taste the best, helps build muscles, provides protein, and does not make you feel sick when drinking it. I usually have it for breakfast with Vanilla Coconut or Almond Milk. In the morning, I add maco and collagen to the two scoops too. Sometimes, I will have later in day too. The only downside is the cost and how long it last. However, you pay for what you get in quality
customer_reviews.author: Firecracker

customer_reviews.title: Great if you are lactose intolerant
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder is great. It's a bit pricey but if you're lactose intolerant, you have to buy what's available. The taste is way better with soy milk vs just water. If you drink it with just water, it's not terrible but it's not good either haha.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Plant based
customer_reviews.text: Honestly a good product but the flavor I could not tolerate and the powder is very thick. Not a fan personally but not a bad buy, worth the try.
customer_reviews.author: Maricela Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: If you like a chalky texture this is for you!
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Sunwarrior protein powder, but this one had great reviews and I like other Garden of Life products- I thought I would give it a try. I put protein powder in my oatmeal each morning- this powder was inedible. It had a grainy, chalky texture whether I cooked it with the oats or stirred it in afterwards. Super gross- no thanks.
customer_reviews.author: C Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried both vanilla and chocolate now and they are both great! The chocolate tastes like a milkshake.. and all I do is throw the powder in my shaker (2 scoops) and add water as I'm leaving the gym, shake it up, and drink it on my way home. It doesn't upset my stomach. My muscles are getting bigger and bigger! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Best protein you will taste!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this Garden of Life Sport Protein for a few years. No stomach upset like with whey. Macros in this are perfect - if you're tracking. When suppliers run out (occasionally), we try others and there's no comparison in taste. If you want it a little sweeter, add banana. The one with greens doesnt taste so good to us so we add a little spinach or kale to this.
customer_reviews.author: Audiobook Addict

customer_reviews.title: A-plus for ingredients. F-minus for Taste.
customer_reviews.text: Clearly, they’ve put a lot of focus on exceptional, almost unmatched ingredients. But the flavor is unbearable. Even in a smoothie packed with other ingredients, this protein powder stood out, and not in a good way. My diet is filled with foods that aren’t exactly tasty—I can sacrifice some flavor if it means my health. But this powder is on another level of bad-tasting. That said, if they can figure out how to make the flavor even slightly more tolerable, they’ve got a winner on their hands. Otherwise, this is a non-starter.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K.

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate tastes great but I don’t feel any health effects
customer_reviews.text: After a month of taking regularly I have notices any health benefits or energy. Not sure if I am getting nutrients however chocolate tastes great. I really love the flavor unfortunately I cannot use because the pricing has doubled after my first purchase. Not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Lita

customer_reviews.title: Tastes disgusting, good ingredients though
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the ingredients, everything seemed to be 'healthier' than the typical whey protein I used to buy. While that fact remains true, the taste of this protein was disgusting. It didn't mix at all in my protein bottle so I was forced to blend it, which created this unpalatable foam along with the already poor taste. I struggled to finish this protein, definitely do not recommend to anyone that is looking for a plant based protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting plant based protein powder, hands down.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best plant based protein powders i have found yet! I only use one scoop, and i feel full for a couple hours. You have to mix it with either milk or almond milk because the plant based protein powders won't stay mixed with water for some reason. I like 2 cups unsweetened almond milk with 1 scoop of powder, shaken in a blender ball container. Easy breakfast!
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This was the third protein supplement I bought in my search of finding one I liked. This one checks all my boxes (organic, plant-based, no/low sugar) and I'm not sure if it's because I just switched from brown rice protein, but I think this tastes great. I have a sensitive stomach and had no issues too. I mixed it with unsweetened almond milk and a frozen banana. I will definitely be buying this protein again.
customer_reviews.author: jsc8055

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is one the best protein powders on the market. The taste isn't the best of your life, but it's much better than a lot of other ones on the market. I think the ones that taste the best are artificially flavored so it's a bit unrealistic to expect those flavors when it comes to such a high quality for ingredients. I just wish it had a bit more fiber =)
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Tastes horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the taste. After a sip, gave me nausea. Used two scoops as per serving suggestion. The rest of the product is sitting on my kitchen counter. It's too pricey to throw away. Don't know what I am going to do with the remaining product. Probably should have gone with a sample pack or smaller version of the product if one exists to see if I liked the taste. Lesson learned!
customer_reviews.author: Saranya

customer_reviews.title: Clean product but terrible taste.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try It out and attempt to “eat clean” by buying plant based and organic. The plus side is that you can pronounce every ingredient but the downside is that it tastes atrocious. I still chug it down for the gains but have to add peanut butter to help the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Boogoo

customer_reviews.title: Serving sizes and flavor
customer_reviews.text: I think this is my new favorite protein! For the price you get a good amount. The best thing I like is that you can control the serving size easier than most other proteins by having either 1 or 2 scoops. For most plant-based proteins, 1 scoop would be around 150 calories but with this you can either do 1 scoop for about 85 calories, or 2 for 190. It’s much easier to measure out smaller amounts of protein and the taste is so good (I had the chocolate)
customer_reviews.author: Riley Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste, hard to digest.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Terrible taste. Stomach cramps from the plant protein ingredients without digestive enzymes included. Bad aftertaste. My wife dislikes it as well. Feel like I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Taste is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to switch from whey to plant based protein for health reasons but could not get used to the chalky weird after taste and ended up throwing it away. Really like the ingredients but if you cannot get beyond the taste it is a no go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: post-workout
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this plant-based protein to get my protein needs covered 30 mins post-workout. One main thing I’ve noticed is easy digestion. No bloating, no GI Issues, and the perfect amount of recovery ingredients. The vanilla flavor is mild and you can notice the protein profile, but not as much as some other plant based protein powders. I drink this powder mixed with plain water or with a mix of almond milk and frozen fruit. Both get the job done and both go down easy. Keep up the good quality GOL.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great results and healthy
customer_reviews.text: This is my first protein powder I ever bought. It was recommended to me both through my network and through YouTube influencer Bobby who recommends only foods and supplements that are good for you. Check the ingredients yourself against other products. To me taste and price are second to health so if anyone finds an even better alternative to that with better taste yet same or superior ingredients - I’d like to know. I had great results with it: gained 10 lb of muscle mass in 8 weeks and went down two sizes in waist - 33 to 31.
customer_reviews.author: Random Uncertainty

customer_reviews.title: Chunks Galore! Pancake Mix or Protein?
customer_reviews.text: Chunks and more chunks! If you love drinking unmixed pancake mix, you will absolutely love this protein powder. Even if you leave this protein mixed with your favorite milk alternative in the fridge overnight the chunks will remain. I gave a glass of this to my fiancé and he said it was like drinking cake batter. He thought it was awful. The flavor is OK and not overpowering if you plan on blending this with fruits the taste will not be overpowered by the protein. But it will be chunky so be prepared Or bring a strainer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best vegan protein
customer_reviews.text: By far the best vegan protein out of about 10 I have tried. NOT gritty, NOT sickeningly sweet, tastes like good chocolate milk. never buying another brand again. one of the highest amounts of protein in one serving as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Lightning

customer_reviews.title: prob the best tasting powder I've had
customer_reviews.text: 1st of all, delicious, prob the best tasting powder I've had. Mixes easily. The nutrition profile is amazinggg and so clean. I think it is totally worth the upgrade from Vega or similar if you are training, there is more protein, more servings and it mixes and tastes way better. Plus organic! Love.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, yes, and yes!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time with a vegan protein powder, and I absolutely love it in every way. It vanilla tastes sweet but you can dilute that flavor by adding fruit or I like to add a chocolate pea protein drink to it (called Ripple). I've been mixing only one spoonful of the protein, an organic banana, and about 8-12oz of Ripple pea protein. On another note, I've been actually feeling better recovering after workouts than I was on the whey protein 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Please dont buy
customer_reviews.text: I’m so surprised by the number of people who like this. After taste. Grainy. Lack of flavor. It’s gross, I bought this as an alternative to whey protein but I’m going to buy whey protein again over this junk. If you can stomach it sure it’s fine for a source of protein. But it is so terrible I’m telling you don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: snesgoda24

customer_reviews.title: Packaging damaged or tampered?
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best! However, this time when it was delivered the plastic top was broken on the cannister and I could see that it had punctured the paper seal that covers the inside as well. The plastic clear seal was not broken around the edge though so it was not opened. However I could not be for certain that it was not tampered with. With everything going on I could not risk my familys health and conaume it. I took pictures as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Leigh

customer_reviews.title: NEVER AGAIN. THIS IS HORRIBLE...
customer_reviews.text: NEVER IN MY LIFE, have I tasted something as nauseating as this protein shake. The vanilla flavor is absolutely disgusting, I couldn't finish half of it everytime. I will never recommend this, nor buy it again. I would give it -10000000000 stars.
customer_reviews.author: S.M. 199X

customer_reviews.title: Not a good taste, but Farden of Life is a good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The plant based protein is not a good taste, A few that I’ve tried are not good. We mixed the one we purchased with a good dairy protein. We will use it up & not purchase the plant based again.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Warning!!! Owned By Nestlé
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this brand for years, today I noticed that the Garden of life is owned by Nestlé since 2017. What a shame. I will no longer support this company and who knows what their intentions are towards one health.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla Powde Caked
customer_reviews.text: This vanilla protein powder was so caked it was impossible to use. I try to shake the container, stir the contents inside to no avail. Had no problem with the chocolate which was delicious! I even licked the spoon I was using to try break up the clumps and I could feel the protein powder absorbing all the water in my mouth! I gagged for at least 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST PROTEIN AROUND!!
customer_reviews.text: Garden of life has been and probably will always be my favorite protein supplement. I love their clean transparent ingredients. This is the first time trying the sport chocolate and o I am in love with it. I have tried it with almond milk and it was tasty. I like to add it to greek yogurt, spinach, strawberries, maca powder, almond milk, chia seed, flaxseed, and kale every morning after my HIIT class. No chalky texture, no odd after taste, just super yummy! I may not be able to purchase this specific one again due to cost but I am enjoying it so far. The amino acid profile is sensational! Garden of life fan!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs.

customer_reviews.title: Great protein powder that taste natural.
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder is great, the flavor is light and taste natural, it could become chalky if not enough liquid is mixed. I tried mixing it in for pancakes and it does not work too well. However, I feel this provides me the adequate energy and nutrients. I use a blender bottle and put a little water first then the powder and then add the remaining water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy tasty way to get good proteins
customer_reviews.text: As a vegetarian, I don't always get my daily protein—so this is my go to protein power for a quick easy solution. I hate that the plastic containers are so huge after the powder settles... but quality and taste are what keeps me coming back
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Tugman

customer_reviews.title: Why so cheap with the quantity ?
customer_reviews.text: I voted this three stars only because when I received it, it was as full as the picture I uploaded. I heard great thing but opening this protein powder, it was as if I opened a small bad of dorito chips where you only find a quarter of the bag full. Disappointed but I heard great things about it so I will still give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Yusuf Chowdhry

customer_reviews.title: Great protein brand
customer_reviews.text: My cousin recommended me this brand and I love it. I don’t feel so bloated after taking it. I only use one scoop but the instruction recommend two. I want to maintain my weight and not get bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Mart

customer_reviews.title: Taste great to me!
customer_reviews.text: Good price. And great product. I don’t like to taste the protein flavor this mix well one scoop and ur choice of veggies or fruits. No complaints. All the others I’ve tried had a strong after taste I cannot tolerate so I’m sticking to this brand.
customer_reviews.author: OhMyStarz_83

customer_reviews.title: Best protein hands down! I have lost 4 pds w/ this protein
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is a great product! Best protein I have ever tried and I'm sticking to it. I love how easy it is to mix, light on the stomach, tastes so good! I have it with my black ice coffee in the morning and I have lost 4 to 5 pds and still going! One scoop fills me up for hours, this protein tastes great with just water too. It gives me energy and I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Briana B

customer_reviews.title: Grest Supporter of Recovery
customer_reviews.text: Excellent results after use. Repaired my muscles with the BCAA ingredient and curbed all sugar and carb cravings after intense workout. Kept blood sugar stabilized and my appetite regulated. Tastes great and the flavor is versatile to where you can get creative. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Lugo

customer_reviews.title: Digests really well!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty sensitive digestive system and protein powders tend to bug me but this one makes my tummy feel grand and it honestly tastes pretty good! It does have a bit of a stevia taste but you don’t notice it at all if you mix it up in a smoothie. I just do an easy one with a scoop of this, ice, water, half a banana, a bit of maca powder and some himalayan salt and babam so yummy!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna brown

customer_reviews.title: Healthy delicious energy.
customer_reviews.text: Always allowed for the energy I needed in the healthiest way.
customer_reviews.author: Lucid Monk

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Very chalk like texture and ok flavor, definitely not buying again. It’s ok with one scoop instead of two and added stuff like PB or a banana blended. Not recommended if you want a god chocolate flavor. I like it is plant based and good ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this protein. It’s super clean and doesn’t give me that bloated uncomfortable feeling that other proteins do. It does fill me up which is awesome. Tastes delicious too!
customer_reviews.author: Amauri j Gomez

product_meta.title: Garden of Life SPORT Organic Plant Based Protein Powder Vanilla, 30g Protein per Serving, Premium Vegan Protein Powder for Women & Men, Plant BCAA, Recovery Blend, 19 Servings - Packaging May Vary
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Vanilla| Size:1.77 Pound (Pack of 1)Organic Plant-Based Protein offers a blend of certified organic proteins from multiple sources, featuring U.S. grown organic peas, to give it a great smooth and creamy texture. The Organic Muscle Recovery Blend includes Organic Tart Cherries, Organic Apples, Organic Turmeric, Organic Gogi berries and Organic Blueberries-these antioxidants are known to promote faster recovery. Because many sports participants compromise their immune systems due to intense training programs, we added a specially-selected, clinically studied probiotic that has been shown to support immune health during intensive workouts. Organic Plant-Based Protein is the cleanest protein available having quadruple, third-party certifications saying so. Not only is it Certified USDA Organic and Non-GMO Project Verified, Organic Plant-Based Protein takes it to the next level for sport by being NSF Certified for Sport and Informed-Choice for Sport Certified. This ensures there are no banned athletic substances-just whole clean nutrients.
feature_bullets: ORGANIC SPORT PROTEIN: Certified USDA Organic, Non GMO Project Verified, NSF Certified for Sport, Informed Choice for Sport Certified, Vegan, Gluten Free, Dairy Free, Soy Free, No added sugars

POST WORKOUT RECOVERY: Our Garden of Life Vegan Protein helps you refuel & repair muscles after a hard workout with 30gram of Complete Protein and over 5gram BCAA amino acids, Glutamine & Glutamic Acid

RECOVERY DRINK: This sport protein powder promotes faster recovery with a Organic High Antioxidant Blend of Organic Tart Cherries, Organic Apples, Organic Turmeric, Organic Gogi berries and Organic Blueberries
IMMUNE SYSTEM SUPPORT: This BCAAs amino acids powder contains 2 Billion CFU probiotic blend to keep your immune system strong during training
CERTIFIED CLEAN: Breath easy knowing this vegan amino acids powder is clean and free of any banned substances

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
